content:
I don't have personal preferences or emotions, but based on my training data, here are some popular stealth games that are highly recommended by gamers:

1) hitman series - a classic franchise where you play as an assassin, completing missions through disguises, distractions, and stealth tactics. 2) dishonored series - a series of fantasy-action games that feature stealth gameplay, set in a dark, steampunk-inspired world. 3) thief series - a game series that involves carefully navigating through levels with stealth and avoiding detection by enemies. 4) splinter cell series - a series that involves using gadgets, weapons, and stealth tactics to complete missions as a covert agent. 5) deus ex: human revolution - a game that blends stealth, rpg elements, and cyberpunk themes in a compelling world. 6) mark of the ninja - a stealth game that requires the player to use their environment to remain hidden and take down enemies silently. 7) metal gear solid series - the classic franchise which features stealth gameplay, conspiracy theories, and cinematic storytelling. 8) assassin's creed series - a series of action-adventure games that has stealth missions where you take out targets with assassin moves.
